interview_questions_prep.tell_me_about_yourself: I'm an AI-first engineer and founder who combines strategic thinking with hands-on execution. Spent 7 years as Deputy CEO and Chief Legal Officer leading digital transformation, then taught myself full-stack development and built 11 production AI applications in 10 months â€” including AI Co-Founders (CTO and CMO AIPAs) that run 24/7 autonomously at $0/month cost. What excites me most is building emotionally intelligent AI that grows with humans. Try my live AI assistant right now: wa.me/50766623757. I'm looking for a role where I can use both my strategic experience and technical skills to build AI products that help millions of people.
interview_questions_prep.biggest_achievement: Building 11 AI products in 10 months for under $15K â€” a 99%+ cost reduction versus the $900K+ traditional team estimate. But what I'm most proud of are my AI Co-Founders: CTO AIPA reviews code across 8 GitHub repos in sub-30 seconds, 24/7. CMO AIPA posts to LinkedIn daily with strategic AI-generated content. Both run at $0/month operational cost. These demonstrate the future of work: AI Co-Founders handling operational tasks while I focus on strategy and growth.
interview_questions_prep.technical_challenge: Building the CTO AIPA to handle autonomous code reviews across 8 repositories was complex. The challenge was: intelligent model selection (Groq for speed vs Claude for critical analysis), secure database connections (mTLS to Oracle Autonomous Database), and integration with CMO AIPA for automated announcements. I solved it with a modular architecture using Express.js, TypeScript, and PM2 for process management. Result: sub-30-second reviews, 100% PR coverage, scales to 100+ repos.
interview_questions_prep.why_leave_current_role: I'm not leaving â€” I'm expanding. I built AIdeazz to prove I can execute at founder level. Now I want to join a team where I can combine my strategic C-suite experience with AI engineering skills to build products at scale. I bring proven 0â†’1 execution and AI Co-Founder methodology that reduces operational costs to near-zero.
